QueryViewSpec.Name: Prospect Terminate Pre Business Process Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Prospect Terminate Pre Business Process Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select s.ID, c.LOOKUPID as SPONSORID, sc.LOOKUPID as SPONCOMMITMENTID, rpm.PAYMENTMETHOD, rev.LOOKUPID as REVENUEID, rgactivity.AMOUNT as PAYMENTAMOUNT, s.STARTDATE as SONSORSHIPSTARTDATE --payment.[TYPE] as PaymentType, --rgactivity.[TYPE] as RGActivityType, --rpm.PAYMENTMETHODCODE, --dateadd(d, -60, getdate()) as '60_Days_Ago', --currentStatus.[DESCRIPTION], --fte.* --rgactivity.*, payment.* from dbo.sponsorship s left join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION se ON se.ID = s.ID left join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE currentStatus ON currentStatus .ID = se.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on s.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID left join dbo.REVENUE rev on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID left join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY as rgactivity on rgactivity.SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID left join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rgactivity.PAYMENTREVENUEID left join dbo.USR_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION fte on fte.ID = revsplit.REVENUEID left join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD rpm on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rpm.REVENUEID -- this gives us the payment method of the RG left join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = s.CONSTITUENTID left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENT sc on sc.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID where (currentStatus.[DESCRIPTION] = 'Prospect Sponsored' and s.STARTDATE >= dateadd(d, -60, getdate()) and rgactivity.AMOUNT > 0 -- payment received? and rpm.PAYMENTMETHODCODE in (1, 9)); -- paymethod is Cash
